content: this cozy cowl is worked in the round with a simple rib pattern made with one hank of juniper moon farm cumulus dappled or any worsted-weight yarn it requires about 175 225 yards and is knit on 5 0 mm us 8 16 circular needles a stitch marker helps mark the beginning of the round and a tapestry needle is used for weaving in ends gauge isn t critical making this an easy and flexible project suitable for knitters of all levels
